site_name: Plot H11A Within Land Bound By New Kent Road To The NorthRodney Place To The EastPlot H11B And Elephant Park To The South And Plot H5 To The West
description: Details of condition 21 (Noise Monitoring Survey) for Plot H11a as part of construction phase MP4 pursuant to outline planning permission ref. 12/AP/1092 (for Redevelopment for redevelopment to provide a mixed use development comprising a number of buildings ranging between 13.13m (AOD) and 104.8m (AOD) in height with capacity for between 160,579sqm GEA (min) and 254,000sqm GEA (max) residential floorspace together with retail (Class A1-A5), business (Class B1), leisure and community (Class D2 and D1), energy centre (sui generis) uses. New landscaping, park and public realm, car parking, means of access and other associated works).
